Termitron::

"If I haven't been so dump, she would be alive now" cried 
Termmitron "Let's go... Let's go... Your colony is watting and your 
Queen is watting you too... Where will we start to search your 
colony?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> OOC: The "..." thingies are Lynxiz calling Iron Raptor the Queen 
> and not knowing who Iron Raptor is.
> 
> ::Lynxiz::
> "Don't worry," replies Lynxiz, "I'm sure she will forgive you, 
there 
> was nothing you could have done." Lynxiz finishes with a soft, 
> comforting voice. "We must leave soon to find my ...Queen."
>

> 
> > OOC: yep, he robot mode is like Inferno (BW) and like him he can 
fly.
> > 
> > BIC:
> > "I will help" said with sorrow the male while he came in the 
cave "I 
> > haven't anything to come back my colony... she's gone and I'm 
guilty

I 
> > just hope that her spark can forgive me one day my dumpness...  "

seek
